alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 17 at 4:24PM CDT until March 17 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 424 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Samson, or 12 miles northeast of Florala, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Hartford, Slocomb, Samson, Coffee Springs, Chancellor, Kellys Crossroads, Lytle, Marl, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Geneva Municipal A/P, Hendrix Crossroad, Earlytown, Hacoda, Pera, Spears, Eunola, Weeks, Sellersville and High Bluff. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
